pr_title: Create a common list of field names for the Graylog Schema.

timeline.message:
Create a common list of field names for the Graylog Schema.

The Graylog Security team has created a common schema to use as the basis for future official content packs.  This change will make it easier for new and existing Inputs to re-use the fields defined for the Graylog Schema.

timeline.bodyText: What do you think about moving this into the org.graylog.schema package? (doesn't exist yet) I think we will have more related code in there in the future and so it isn't buried in the inputs package. 😃
timeline.author: bernd
timeline.diffHunk:

replies.bodyText: Great idea.  That will promote visibility and re-use.  I'll make the change.
replies.author: waab76
